summary:
The Security Council,

Taking note of the letters from the Secretary-General and the President of the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda (ICTR),

Recalling its previous resolutions, particularly 1503 (2003) and 1534 (2004), which called on the ICTR to complete investigations by the end of 2004, trial activities at first instance by the end of 2008, and all work in 2010,

Recalling its decisions to extend the terms of office of the ICTR judges,

Noting the progress made by the ICTR towards completing its trial work,

Decides to:

1. Extend the terms of office of the following permanent judges in the Appeals Chamber until 31 December 2010: 
- Mr. Mehmet Güney (Turkey)
- Ms. Andrésia Vaz (Senegal)

2. Extend the terms of office of the following permanent judges in the Trial Chambers until 31 December 2009: 
- Mr. Charles Michael Dennis Byron (Saint Kitts and Nevis)
- Mr. Asoka de Silva (Sri Lanka)
- Mr. Sergei Aleckseevich Egorov (Russian Federation)
- Ms. Khalida Rachid Khan (Pakistan)
- Mr. Erik Møse (Norway)
- Ms. Arlete Ramaroson (Madagascar)
- Mr. William Hussein Sekule (United Republic of Tanzania)

3. Extend the terms of office of the following ad litem judges until 31 December 2009: 
- Ms. Florence Rita Arrey (Cameroon)
- Ms. Solomy Balungi Bossa (Uganda)
- Ms. Taghrid Hikmet (Jordan)
- Mr. Vagn Joensen (Denmark)
- Mr. Gberdao Gustave Kam (Burkina Faso)
- Mr. Lee Gacuiga Muthoga (Kenya)
- Mr. Seon Ki Park (Republic of Korea)
- Mr. Emile Francis Short (Ghana)

4. Extend the terms of office of the following ad litem judges, who have not yet been appointed, until 31 December 2009: 
- Mr. Aydin Sefa Akay (Turkey)
- Ms. Karin Hökborg (Sweden)
- Ms. Flavia Lattanzi (Italy)
- Mr. Kenneth Machin (United Kingdom)
- Mr. Joseph Edward Chiondo Masanche (United Republic of Tanzania)
- Tan Sri Dato’ Hj. Mohd. Azmi Dato’ Hj. Kamaruddin (Malaysia)
- Mr. Mparany Mamy Richard Rajohnson (Madagascar)
- Mr. Albertus Henricus Johannes Swart (Netherlands)
- Ms. Aura E. Guerra de Villalaz (Panama)

5. Amend article 11, paragraphs 1 and 2, of the Statute of the ICTR.
